official-title.#text: To provide for a reduction in the pay of the Secretary of Health and Human Services until the healthcare.gov Web site is certified as fully functional.

committee-name.#tail: , and in addition to the Committee on

short-title.#text: Government Lacks Insight To Choose Health Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Reduction in pay of the Secretary of Health and Human Services until healthcare.gov Web site is fully functional

continuation-text.#text: except that in no event shall the applicable percentage for any month exceed 100 percent.
